item.title: My confrontation with the mainstream
item.description: You can check my Goodreads profile. I love science fiction and fantasy. And I know in 2017 and everyone has already observed the dominance of “geek culture”, with the dominance of Disney properties from Marvel and now Star Wars. Hell, Suicide Squad won a goddamn Oscar. Powell's Best Selling Fiction, 2017-02-26 Powell's Best Selling Fiction, 2017-02-26 But I never felt like SFF was all that mainstream.
